name: OmegaRealm
description:
Welcome to the OmegaRealm, a place where the light and shadows meet. You, Player, have absorbed my power, and I...I shall take It BACK!

HOW DO YOU MOVE? Why ask me! YOU should know that Yourself!

Wait...what's up with the description...I can't remove this stuff...the game...It's too Powerful! Player! Defeat the Eldritch Horror and Free yourself and The Game from this Curse...We lay our Hopes on You...To move you can use WASD/Arrow Keys...To attack...Well, I have placed a Dummy In the game, maybe he can tell you. Happy Gaming Player!
